Class RepMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.network.message.Message
      • it.polimi.se2019.network.message.RepMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RepMessage
extends Message
    Message used to send the reps of the model to the player.
    Author:
    MarcerAndrea
